DOC.brief_summary: The hypothesis is that systemic remifentanil and Clonidine act in a synergistic manner to relief acute main in an experimental human pain model. Of interest is also the effect of the combination on respiration, sedation and cognitive behavior.
DOC.brief_title: Clonidine-Remifentanil. Effect of the Combination on Acute Pain and Respiration in Healthy Volunteers
DOC.detailed_description: To examine the possible synergistic effects og systemic remifentanil and clonidine. Its effects on respiration, cognitive function and sedation.
